detaileddescription.para:
Initialize the gas index algorithm parameters for the specified algorithm type and reset its internal states. Call this once at the beginning.
params
Pointer to the GasIndexAlgorithmParams struct
algorithm_type
0 (GasIndexAlgorithm_ALGORITHM_TYPE_VOC) for VOC or 1 (GasIndexAlgorithm_ALGORITHM_TYPE_NOX) for NOx

Reset the internal states of the gas index algorithm. Previously set tuning parameters are preserved. Call this when resuming operation after a measurement interruption.
params
Pointer to the GasIndexAlgorithmParams struct

Get current algorithm states. Retrieved values can be used in GasIndexAlgorithm_set_states() to resume operation after a short interruption, skipping initial learning phase. NOTE: This feature can only be used for VOC algorithm type and after at least 3 hours of continuous operation.
params
Pointer to the GasIndexAlgorithmParams struct
state0
State0 to be stored
state1
State1 to be stored

Set previously retrieved algorithm states to resume operation after a short interruption, skipping initial learning phase. This feature should not be used after interruptions of more than 10 minutes. Call this once after GasIndexAlgorithm_init() or GasIndexAlgorithm_reset() and the optional GasIndexAlgorithm_set_tuning_parameters(), if desired. Otherwise, the algorithm will start with initial learning phase. NOTE: This feature can only be used for VOC algorithm type.
params
Pointer to the GasIndexAlgorithmParams struct
state0
State0 to be restored
state1
State1 to be restored

memberdef.argsstring: (GasIndexAlgorithmParams *params, int32_t index_offset, int32_t learning_time_offset_hours, int32_t learning_time_gain_hours, int32_t gating_max_duration_minutes, int32_t std_initial, int32_t gain_factor)
memberdef.name: GasIndexAlgorithm_set_tuning_parameters

detaileddescription.para: Set parameters to customize the gas index algorithm. Call this once after GasIndexAlgorithm_init() and before optional GasIndexAlgorithm_set_states(), if desired. Otherwise, the default values will be used.

parameterdescription.para: Gas index representing typical (average) conditions. Range 1..250, default 100 for VOC and 1 for NOx
Time constant of long-term estimator for offset. Past events will be forgotten after about twice the learning time. Range 1..1000 [hours], default 12 [hours]

Time constant of long-term estimator for gain. Past events will be forgotten after about twice the learning time. Range 1..1000 [hours], default 12 [hours] NOTE: This value is not relevant for NOx algorithm type
Maximum duration of gating (freeze of estimator during high gas index signal). 0 (no gating) or range 1..3000 [minutes], default 180 [minutes] for VOC and 720 [minutes] for NOx

Initial estimate for standard deviation. Lower value boosts events during initial learning period, but may result in larger device-to-device variations. Range 10..5000, default 50 NOTE: This value is not relevant for NOx algorithm type
Factor used to scale applied gain value when calculating gas index. Range 1..1000, default 230

memberdef.argsstring: (const GasIndexAlgorithmParams *params, int32_t *index_offset, int32_t *learning_time_offset_hours, int32_t *learning_time_gain_hours, int32_t *gating_max_duration_minutes, int32_t *std_initial, int32_t *gain_factor)
memberdef.name: GasIndexAlgorithm_get_tuning_parameters

detaileddescription.para: Get current parameters to customize the gas index algorithm. Refer to GasIndexAlgorithm_set_tuning_parameters() for description of the parameters.
Calculate the gas index value from the raw sensor value.

parameterdescription.para: Raw value from the SGP4x sensor
Calculated gas index value from the raw sensor value. Zero during initial blackout period and 1..500 afterwards
